articles.title: Nurse, 84, ‘still working night shifts’ dies after contracting Covid-19, heartbroken grand daughter confirms - Evening Standard

An NHS nurse who continued to work night shifts into her 80s has died after contracting Covid-19, her devastated family have confirmed.
Margaret Tapley, 84, passed away on Saturday after devoting her life to others, her granddaughter said in a moving Faceboo… [+2611 chars]

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Coronavirus: Auxiliary nurse who was still working at 84 dies after contracting COVID-19 - Sky News
articles.description: Tributes are paid to healthcare worker Margaret Tapley as she is hailed a "champion" and "heroine".
